thread.title: Law Society raised Michelle Thomson solictor concerns
thread.title_full: Law Society raised Michelle Thomson solictor concerns - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Law Society raised Michelle Thomson solictor concerns
text:
1
Have your say Concerns about the solicitor being investigated over property deals linked to MP Michelle Thomson were raised with the Serious and Organised Crime Agency (Soca) four years ago, it has emerged.
The Law Society of Scotland has confirmed it submitted a suspicious activity report (SAR) on Christopher Hales to the agency in October 2011.
The SAR was submitted following an inspection of Mr Halesâ€™ firm which resulted in him being suspended, prosecuted by a discipline tribunal and subsequently struck off as a solicitor in 2014.
